title: The Awakening
description: The adventurer wakes up in a private booth in Ye Ol' Fiddle with no recollection of how they got there. They were found unconscious by Elias in the sailors’ quarters.

backstory.ifBackstoryProvided: They were involved in a fight with the wrong crowd the night before.

details: Elias ensures the adventurer is feeling better.
He only responds to two questions before returning to play music.
He is evasive about why he was in the sailors’ quarters.

rumorsInTheTavern.description: Most patrons discuss personal, unimportant matters, but two groups stand out:

groups.discussion: Discussing a warehouse bought by outsiders. They fired all local workers but continue operations in secret.
Discussing a failed bandit raid on an upstream barge, repelled by the riverine coastguard.

choicesAndNextSteps.description: The adventurer can investigate either rumor:

choices.choice: Follow the group by the door
Follow the group near the stage
